tags: None
review:
Hi, I am so glad to have found smilessence dental clinic and Dr Nysha.Her attention to detail and professionalism is extra ordinary. 
I would recommend her anyday.
I am very impressed by the high quality of work, care, and her positive attitude. She provides information about everything she does and does not force you for a treatment. She is providing quality treatment at affordable prices. Her hitech equipment like digital X-ray is also very impressive which hand in hand with comfort and precise results. 
I recommend completely.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Sealant,
review:
To start with, I felt 
Ambience was nice n pleasing. 
It stood strongly with the name Dentease.
Doctor Nysha took the initiative to see that I was at ease during the course of the entire Dental Treatment.
Dr explained the dental problems, discussed the treatment she wanted to do and the costs it will incur.
Zirconia crowns was perfect n I liked it although it took some more time for the bridge crown to be fixed to be honest.
Overall, I am happy with the Dental Treatment I got at Dentease üëç
Will definitely recommend my family and friends to get their Dental Treatment done at Dentease.
Keep up the good work...Cheers
reply_text: Thankyou for taking your time out and giving a detailed review, these encouraging words always gives more motivation to provide efficient treatment to patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Nysha was one of my experience of the dentist so far. She made me soo comfortable of the tooth extraction surgery which I was verrry scared of. she paitently explained everything and gave her suggestions understanding as a paitient how confused I was. post surgery she was always available and made sure I go through no pain. She took initiative herself to ask for feedback and was always available in case of any problem. If she is your Dentist you don't need anyone else ! I would highly recommend and thank her for my smooth procedure. I am set for my root canal too now, I am sure I am in safe hands !
reply_text: Thankyou for the valuable feedback, your comfort is our priority and good to know that you had a nice experience with us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Nysha Garg was very welcoming and appreciative of the fact I turned up for a general dentist checkup.she explained me flaws in brushing my teeth, explained the areas where tar is accumulated and told me clearly how scaling removes it.during scaling she was very responsive for any minor complaints which I had. which I feel is super important according to me. She has a TV right above your head while the scaling process is going on. The equipment which she has is very modern and quite impressive.I would definitely visit the clinic twice a year for checkup and I feel everyone in India should have a dental check-up done once a year
reply_text: Thank you Bhargava we do appreciate the precious feedback that you have provided us and we really value your time and effort in writing this beautiful testimonial for us!it only inspires us to work harder and better to create a unique experience for you!

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited the dentist thru Practo. 

There was no waiting as I was the only one in the clinic. Initially, I visited for Dental cleaning but doc suggested cavity and 1 RCT. Hence I decided to go for both procedure on the day of treatment. 

Later, the RCT was done by another dentist at Ms. Garg's clinic who visited especially to do my RCT procedure, My worry was I wasn't aware about the other doctor's background & experience *** ***** * ***** **** **** ******* *** *** ** ******** ** * ******** In my experience, I've never visited a dentist who would call another dentist for any critical treatments. After 2 days, I was in unbearable pain and then I had to visit another dentist t*** *** ****** *********** ** ******** *** ************* *********** **** ****** *** ****** *** ** *** ***** **** *** **** ****** *********** ***** **** **** * ******** ***** **** ****** ***** ******** ************ *** *** ********* ** * ******* **** ** ******* * * ****** **** ** ********* *** ******* ** *** ****** ******.

******* ** ***** *** **** ******* ******* *** ** **** *** ********* ** * ******** ** *** *** ** * **** **** * * ** ****** ************ ******** 

Additionally, I asked my reports and xrays to be uploaded on Practo which is still not uploaded but rather it was sent to me on Whatsapp. Its an additional tasks for me to keep my medical history on Practo.

*** ****** ****** ** ** *** ****** *** *** *** ********* **** *** *********** ***** *** ** ** ********** ** * ******* **** ******* ******* *** ***** **** ********
reply_text:
Thank you for your review. To answer each of your queries point by point. 1) We are a Multispeciality Practice, where like any other Advance Multispeciality Center each treatment is done by the Specialist(M.D.S.) in that field, for example Root Canal Therapy by M.D.S. Endodontist, Crown and bridge by M.D.S. Prosthodontist. This is done to ensure perfection in all our treatments. We had discussed the same with you during your first visit and thus scheduled an appointment later in the day for same with our M.D.S. Endodontist. 2) Your chief complaint was  ‚Äúcleaning of the lower right last tooth‚Äù. On clinical and radiographical examination of the concerned wisdom tooth, it was found to be decayed with pulpal involvement. Ideal treatment for this is Root Canal Therapy followed by filling and cap, hence was suggested. 3) Pain is unavoidable part of root canal therapy which needs to be managed properly. We always give our patients 24 by 7 contact number to get back to us. In your case we saw you next day when you were fine and called you for a follow up appointment after a day which you could not come, since you were travelling. In our conversation a week later, again no discomfort was conveyed to us. We aim at helping our patients even after treatment is over when approached. 4) Practo sharing of files had some technical error, so we had sent you by a different means, and also raised the concern with Practo back office team and I believe it‚Äôs taken care off since I received a confirmation email. 5) Our facility is open for full day so we can spread out our appointments for no waiting time and comfort of patients and doctors. 
Please feel free to talk to us or visit us anytime, if you have any discomfort and/or any concerns  . Thanks & Regards, Team DentEase

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very empathetic. Explains issue very clearly, multiple times if necessary so that patients can mull things over and make informed decisions. Very responsive to feedback regarding inconvenience/pain during the treatment, which is an often overlooked and underappreciated by most dentists (at least in my opinion). Clinic infrastructure looks modern and up to date. Spared no convenience when it comes to patient's comfort. Very little wait time. Also, very accommodating for rescheduling. Overall quite customer-centric service, which is very appreciated. 10/10 would recommend her to others.
reply_text: Dear Katyayani, We thank you for your testimonial. We look forward to taking care of your dental needs in the future. Keep Smiling! Team DentEase

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly, the appointment started bang on time and that's always great. The look and feel of the clinic was amazing and it's also at a very convenient location next to Western Express Highway at Goregaon. The facilities and equipments  looked very modern and to my amazement, there was also an overhead screen with entertaining videos just for me while I was comfortably seated on the treatment chair. The absence of pain was another pleasant surprise. The treatment got done quickly and the results were amazing. I've now decided to trust Dr. Nysha Garg with all my dental treatments in the future. Thank you Practo for booking this appointment and thank you Dr. Nysha Garg for the amazing treatment.
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr Bhaskaran for your kind words. It encourages us to  continue like this every day. We appreciate you taking out time.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with the treatment for my son. He had a cavity and I had got it filled up earlier with another doctor but it came out after sometime. Then I showed him to another doctor who said that the filling will not stay. My son was facing lot of problems while eating and then I showed him to Dr. Nysha Garg. She understood the problem well and then treated the same. She also said that if I would not have got it filled up, it might have developed into a root canal. I am very happy that I showed my son to her within time and got the treatment done.
reply_text: Thanks a lot Ms Nutan, words like this keep us motivated to do our work.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I highly recommend Dr Nysha Garg for her professionalism and thorough explanation of the dental issues in layman terms and for not forcing any treatment on her patients, but giving them the choice go decide after weighing all the pros and cons and treatment options. I visited her twice and both times was very happy with the experience and the end result.

tags: None
review:
I visited Dr Nysha for dental fillings. 
One of the finest clinics I have seen. Very soothing ambience, world class chair and X-ray. The whole place felt very cozy, clean and hygienic. I have this phobia of hospitals but this one felt  like at home and the treatment was painless. The doctor and the staff were very cordial. She also took time to explain me how to maintain teeth after treatment in everyday routine as well how to help my toddler  do the same. I recommend Dr Nysha anytime.

Extremely happy with the treatment and doctor.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I live in US, and was visiting India for a week. And to my bad luck I had a fall and traumatized all my front teeth. That's when a friend told me about his positive experience with Dr Nysha. I visited her with a lot of pain and questions in my head. And from that point on I thank my stars to have found her. She took such good care of me right from pain medications, treatment procedure via digital media , and most importantly calming me down. All my upper front teeth root canal were done seemlessly and completely natural looking caps were done in period of 1 week. I am back home now and have no problem. I recommend her 100 percent.
reply_text: Thankyou for taking time out and sharing your experience in such wonderful  and encouraging words, also because your cooperation we could complete the treatment so smoothly and within time.
